content:
CHECK IN / CHECK OUT

Upon check-in you will receive a sms and an email with code for your room.
The code works throughout your stay between check-in and check-out time.
Check-in from 15:00. Check-out until 11:00.

 

 

CANCELLATION/PREPAYMENT

The guest can cancel free of charge ut to 30 days before the arrival date. Guests must pay the total price of the booking if they cancel from 30 days prior to the arrival date.
